entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 inland. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
